section.body: The thing you drink, done, next question.

section.header: What is this 'Sauce' aspect people are talking about?
section.body: Well, it's not really an aspect, it's an entity.

section.header: Whoa, what is this 'Juice entity' thing?
section.body: It's an entity that motivates you to battle against Sauce.
There's no easy way to figure that out.
